sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Box, Spacer, Link, Img, Button } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import logo from "../assets/logo.png"; import "../styles/NavBar.css"; import { HamburgerIcon, CloseIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons' const NavBar = () => { const [display, changeDisplay] = useState('none'); const contact = "https://wa.me/6281215267243"; return( <> Home About FAQ Contact ) }; export default NavBar;
